title: The.Revolution.Will.Be.Televised.s03e03.ENG.SUBS.WEBRIP
description:
The.Revolution.Will.Be.Televised.s03e03.ENG.SUBS.WEBRIP

Satirical series filmed in the USA and UK. It features bite-sized comedy hits, from fictionalised characters to stunt-led sketches, which brings the corruption, greed and hypocrisy of politicians, avaricious multinationals and tax-shy corporations who have been taking the British and American public for a ride for years to the fore. Street magician Alternator 'disappears' the belongings of some Wall Street bankers. James and Barnaby use their visit to the United Nations to declare war on behalf of Britain. 'Kinky' Dutch TV personalities Raffa and Ralph have a drug-fuelled fetish party at a pharmaceutical corporation and Nigel Farage comes face to face with Lenny Henry, sort of
